price: Gewiß, diejenigen, die aus Furcht vor ihrem Herrn besorgt sind
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ هُم مِّنۡ خَشۡيَةِ رَبِّهِم مُّشۡفِقُونَ

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna hum min khashyati rabbihim mush'fiqūna
